Created an attachment (id=78665)
RCP application that demonstrates the problem

Build ID: I20070621-1340

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run the attached RCP app.
2. Click on the button marked 'MyAction'. The progress service busy cursor appears. When the task is complete, 'Done.' is written to stdout. This is good.
3. Click rapidly many times on 'MyAction'. The error below is written to stderr due to the action being invoked re-entrantly. This should not be possible.
4. The same thing happens with the 'Finish' button in the wizard launched using 'MyWizard'.

Unhandled event loop exception during blocked modal context.
